actions.recommendation: Ideal blood pressure is between 90-60mmHg diastolic (bottom number) and 120-80mmHg systolic (top number). If remains high implement lifestyle changes in consultation with your doctor.

ECG: LVH is often caused by hypertension, discuss with your doctor. Sinus bradycardia can be a normal finding in athletes, exercise strengthens the heart muscle to pump a greater amount of blood with each heartbeat
Eating a diet rich in fruits, vegetables, lean proteins, and whole grains can help maintain a healthy weight and reduce the risk of chronic diseases.
Regular exercise is essential for maintaining a healthy lifestyle. Aim for at least 30 minutes of moderate-intensity exercise most days of the week.
Avoid smoking and limit alcohol consumption to reduce the risk of chronic diseases.
